LanguageData.EggGryphonFertilized.label: gryphon egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggGryphonFertilized.description: Fertilized gryphon egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby gryphon. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggGryphonUnFertilized.label: gryphon egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.EggGryphonUnFertilized.description: Unfertilized gryphon egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.Gryphon.label: Gryphon
LanguageData.Gryphon.description: This creature looks like lion mixed well with eagle. They are as big as bear, and as fast as eagle. Need to be careful taming them.
LanguageData.Gryphon.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Gryphon.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Gryphon.tools.beak.label: beak
